sentences.en: A transition zone from smooth pond to rougher surroundings resembles a beach, notes Chapman.
sentences.cn: 凯普曼注意到平坦的池塘与起伏的滩地之间的过渡区.

sentences.en: As the wind blew harder, so the sea grew rougher.
sentences.cn: 风刮得更大了, 海浪也更汹涌了.

sentences.en: But now I'm growing up, I want to look rougher and more mature.
sentences.cn: 但现在我已经长大了, 我想自己看上去更粗犷,更成熟一些.

sentences.en: David : Basketball is much rougher than volleyball. Justat how rough the NBA is.
sentences.cn: 篮球比排球激烈得多, 看看NBA就知道了.

sentences.en: For a tighter, more secure fit, substitute either thicker laces or cotton laces a rougher surface.
sentences.cn: 为严格, 更安全的适合, 替代或者较厚花边或棉花花边的粗糙表面.

sentences.en: For the sea was getting rougher and rougher.
sentences.cn: 这是因为海越来越翻腾着.

sentences.en: It'shows a bit rougher side of Poison and I really like the lyrics as well.
sentences.cn: 它表明有点粗糙的一面毒药,我真的很喜欢的歌词,以及.

sentences.en: Life a little rougher on the teeth back than two then, too.
sentences.cn: 当时的生活也使得后齿要粗糙坚硬些.

sentences.en: My first Life was probably rougher on the teeth back them then, too.
sentences.cn: 那时的生活可能对牙齿的要求也更高.

sentences.en: Other well - known figures received rougher treatment.
sentences.cn: 其他 知名 人物的待遇更糟.

sentences.en: Stationary may be less white and of a rougher texture.
sentences.cn: (用回收的材料生产的)文具可能没那么白而且质地粗糙一些.

sentences.en: The waves became rougher as they drifted.
sentences.cn: 他们漂流的时候，波浪越来越汹涌了。

sentences.en: The winter closed in and the weather grew colder and rougher.
sentences.cn: 冬天将至,天气又冷又多暴风雨.

sentences.en: This is where Singaporeans must remain more united to face the rougher times ahead.
sentences.cn: 前路难行,新加坡人这一刻就应该更加团结.

sentences.en: When touch the fake egg by hand, it feels a little rougher than the real egg.
sentences.cn: 用手触摸假鸡蛋蛋壳, 会觉得比真鸡蛋粗糙一些.

trans.tran_cn: 粗糙的( rough的比较级 )，粗鲁的，不幸的，粗制的
